mapper.update: UPDATE personnel_welfare SET population = #{population}, budget_amount = #{budgetAmount} WHERE welfare_id = #{welfareId} AND alive_flag = '1'
mapper.select:
SELECT welfare_id AS welfareId, welfare_name AS welfareName FROM personnel_welfare WHERE alive_flag = '1'
AND welfare_name = #{welfareName}
mapper.update: UPDATE personnel_welfare SET examine_status = '1' WHERE alive_flag = '1' AND welfare_id = #{welfareId}
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO personnel_welfare_record( welfare_record_id, welfare_id, get_user_id, get_user_id_card, get_user_name, give_time, get_flag, create_time, create_user_id, create_user_name, alive_flag, finish_flag )VALUES
( UUID(), #{obj.welfareApplyForm.welfareId}, #{obj.userId}, #{obj.idCard}, #{obj.userName}, #{obj.welfareApplyForm.giveTime}, '0', NOW(), #{obj.welfareApplyForm.createUserId}, #{obj.welfareApplyForm.createUserName}, '1', '0' )

INSERT INTO personnel_welfare ( welfare_id, welfare_name, welfare_code, text, reason, give_time, examine_status, create_time, create_user_id, create_user_name, alive_flag, budget_amount, population ) VALUES ( #{welfareId}, #{welfareName}, DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%y%m%d%H%i%s'), #{text}, #{reason}, #{giveTime}, '0', NOW(), #{createUserId}, #{createUserName}, '1', #{budgetAmount}, #{population} )

INSERT INTO personnel_welfare_stream ( welfare_stream_id, welfare_id, examine_user_id, examine_user_name, examine_status, create_time, create_user_id, create_user_name, stream_type, alive_flag ) VALUES ( UUID(), #{welfareId}, #{examineUserId}, #{examineUserName}, '1', NOW(), #{createUserId}, #{createUserName}, '1', '1' )
mapper.update: UPDATE personnel_welfare_stream SET examine_status = '2', update_time = NOW(), update_user_id = '${updateUserId}', update_user_name = '${updateUserName}' WHERE alive_flag = '1' AND welfare_id = #{welfareId}
UPDATE personnel_welfare_record SET finish_flag = '1' WHERE alive_flag = '1' AND welfare_id = #{welfareId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO personnel_welfare_stream ( welfare_stream_id, welfare_id, examine_status, create_time, create_user_id, create_user_name, stream_type, alive_flag ) VALUES ( UUID(), #{welfareId}, '1', NOW(), #{updateUserId}, #{updateUserName}, '2', '1' )
mapper.select: SELECT give_time AS giveTime FROM personnel_welfare WHERE welfare_id = #{welfareId} AND alive_flag = '1'
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO personnel_welfare_record ( welfare_record_id, welfare_id, get_user_id, get_user_id_card, get_user_name, give_time, get_flag, create_time, alive_flag ) VALUES
( UUID(), #{record.welfareId}, #{record.getUserId}, #{record.getUserIdCard}, #{record.getUserName}, #{record.giveTime}, '0', NOW(), '1' )
mapper.select:
SELECT a.welfare_record_id AS welfareRecordId, a.welfare_id AS welfareId, a.get_user_id AS getUserId, a.get_user_id_card AS getUserIdCard, a.get_user_name AS getUserName, a.give_time AS giveTime, DATE_FORMAT(a.give_time,'%Y-%m-%d') AS giveTimeStr, a.get_time AS getTime, DATE_FORMAT(a.get_time,'%Y-%m-%d') AS getTimeStr, a.get_flag AS getFlag, a.create_time AS createTime, DATE_FORMAT(a.create_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS createTimeStr, a.create_user_id AS createUserId, a.create_user_name AS createUserName, a.update_time AS updateTime, DATE_FORMAT(a.update_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS updateTimeStr, a.update_user_id AS updateUserId, a.update_user_name AS updateUserName, b.welfare_name AS welfareName, b.welfare_code AS welfareCode, b.text AS text, b.reason AS reason, c.department_name AS departmentName, c.post_name AS postName, b.budget_amount AS budgetAmount FROM personnel_welfare_record a, personnel_welfare b, user_info c WHERE b.alive_flag = '1' AND c.alive_flag = '1' AND b.alive_flag = '1' AND a.welfare_id = b.welfare_id AND c.user_id = a.get_user_id
AND a.welfare_record_id = '${welfareRecordId}'
AND a.welfare_id = '${welfareId}'
AND a.get_user_id = '${getUserId}'
AND a.get_user_id_card = '${getUserIdCard}'
AND a.get_user_name LIKE (${getUserName})
AND a.get_flag = '${getFlag}'
AND b.welfare_code LIKE (${welfareCode})
AND b.welfare_name LIKE (${welfareName})
AND b.department_name LIKE (${departmentName})
AND b.post_name LIKE (${postName})
ORDER BY ${sort} ${order}
mapper.update:
UPDATE personnel_welfare_record SET get_time = NOW(), get_flag = '1' WHERE welfare_id = #{welfareId}
AND get_user_id = #{getUserId}
mapper.select:
SELECT a.welfare_stream_id AS welfareStreamId, a.welfare_id AS welfareId, a.examine_user_id AS examineUserId, a.examine_user_name AS examineUserName, a.examine_idea AS examineIdea, a.examine_status AS examineStatus, a.next_examine_user_name AS nextExamineUserName, a.examine_time AS examineTime, DATE_FORMAT(a.examine_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS examineTimeStr, a.create_time AS createTime, DATE_FORMAT(a.create_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS createTimeStr, a.update_time AS updateTime, DATE_FORMAT(a.update_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS updateTimeStr, a.stream_type AS streamType, b.text AS text, b.reason AS reason, b.create_User_id AS createUserId, b.create_user_name AS createUserName, b.welfare_name AS welfareName, b.welfare_code AS welfareCode, b.give_time AS giveTime, DATE_FORMAT(b.give_time,'%Y-%m-%d') AS giveTimeStr, b.population, b.budget_amount AS budgetAmount FROM personnel_welfare_stream a, personnel_welfare b WHERE a.alive_flag = '1' AND b.alive_flag = '1' AND a.welfare_id = b.welfare_id
AND a.welfare_stream_id = '${welfareStreamId}'
AND a.welfare_id = '${welfareId}'
AND a.examine_user_id = '${examineUserId}'
AND a.examine_status = '${examineStatus}'
AND a.stream_type = '${streamType}'
AND a.examine_user_name LIKE (${examineUserName})
AND b.welfare_name LIKE (${welfareName})
AND b.welfare_code = '${welfareCode}'
AND b.create_user_name LIKE (${createUserName})
ORDER BY a.create_time DESC
ORDER BY ${sort} ${order}

SELECT welfare_id AS welfareId, welfare_name AS welfareName, welfare_code AS welfareCode, text AS text, reason AS reason, give_time AS giveTime, DATE_FORMAT(give_time,'%Y-%m-%d') AS giveTimeStr, record_user_id AS recordUserId, record_time AS recordTime, DATE_FORMAT(record_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS recordTimeStr, examine_status AS examineStatus, create_time AS createTime, DATE_FORMAT(create_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS createTimeStr, create_user_id AS createUserId, create_user_name AS createUserName, update_time AS updateTime, DATE_FORMAT(update_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS updateTimeStr, update_user_id AS updateUserId, update_user_name AS updateUserName, budget_amount AS budgetAmount, population, alive_flag AS aliveFlag FROM personnel_welfare WHERE alive_flag = '1'
AND welfare_id = '${welfareId}'
AND create_user_id = '${createUserId}'
AND create_user_name LIKE (${createUserName})
AND examine_status = '${examineStatus}'
AND welfare_name LIKE ${welfareName}
AND welfare_code LIKE ${welfareCode}
AND create_time >= STR_TO_DATE(#{startCreateTimeStr},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')
AND create_time <= STR_TO_DATE(#{endCreateTimeStr},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')
ORDER BY create_time DESC
ORDER BY ${sort} ${order}
